channel.title: How i make certrain items train certain levels
channel.description:
Well mainly I want my Dark Bow and karils xbow to train range...
And I want the default training for all mele weapons to be strength....
How do I do this? Is the second one even possible? PLEASE HELP!

item.title: How i make certrain items train certain levels
item.dc:creator: @n0va_k0 n0va k0
item.description:
@n0va_k0 wrote:

No idea how to do it with that one but yeah, just put d bow under the use(bow) void. Forgot what it was called :\ add it to all the other bow id’s. If you want it to do your own animations like if you want to use rune c bow (thanks to whitey) go under void attack(npc) one for range >.>. Make a use(cross), put the attack animation. So on

Read full topic
item.source: How i make certrain items train certain levels

Yes, the second one is definitely possible.
